QuestData.Title: Shikaar Giver
QuestData.Description:
Oh, $p.
Do you feel comfort under the sun? Do you feel safe under its bright caress? Does each new day represent hope for the future and a chance to live your life as you've always dreamt it?
Then you know love as I do.
Narman of Clan Shikaar is my sun. He is my warmth. He is my light. He is my hope.
A man like him deserves a proposal worthy of stature.
We must seek guidance from an Ohn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Windsage Dawa prepare for the perfect proposal.
QuestData.RewardText:
Arbhog's horns? They'll do just fine.
Arbhog was once the mightiest musken on the plains. These are a fitting gift for the mightiest hunter. I am sure Narman will appreciate them.
Perhaps one day he will teach me to hunt. An Ohn'ir huntsman. Ha! Imagine that.
